Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello! How can I assist you today?
I'm sorry to hear that your conversion tracking isn't working. Could you let me know which tracking platform you're using? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Thanks for letting me know you're using Shopify. To ensure your conversion tracking is set up correctly, please verify if the custom event is placed correctly in Shopify and if it fires. You can use the ‘Test’ feature in Shopify to load the event. For purchase or complete payment events, you will need to make a purchase for the test to complete. If you cannot make a purchase, please reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
For more detailed instructions on integrating the NewsBreak Pixel into your Shopify store, you can refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify).
